thread.title: Man seriously injured in Galewood shooting
thread.title_full: Man seriously injured in Galewood shooting | Chicago Sun-Times

title: Man seriously injured in Galewood shooting
text:
A man was seriously wounded in a shooting Tuesday night in the Galewood neighborhood on the Northwest Side.
The 29-year-old was walking on the sidewalk in the 2200 block of North Merrimac about 10:30 p.m. when a male got out of a dark-colored SUV and fired shots at him, according to police.
He was shot in the abdomen and right leg and taken to Loyola University Medical Center in Maywood in serious condition, police said.
A police source said the man is a documented gang member.
